name: Haxtec Metal Dice
description: A full dice set inspired by the Arcane Netflix show. This dice set comes in purple or blue shades and will last along time thanks to their metallic make.

name: Hex Chest Dice Box
description: A handcrafted wooden dice box, with selectable engravings or art. Emerald ocean dice set included

name: D&D Dice Jail
description: What do you do with the D20 that's rolled 1's all night? THROW THEM IN JAIL! This handcrafted wooden dice jail is perfect for punishing and containing dice. Comes with a set of Starry Night dice.

name: Arcane Vein Dice
description: Discovering the mysteries of the Arcane are dangerous, and need the right equipment. This dice set is set with veins of purple or green color.

name: Leather Dice Tray
description: A foldable leather dice tray, with selectable art works across a wide range of games and custom art is welcome.

name: Bolivian Rosewood Dice Tray
description: A cheap but sturdy and magnificent dice tray. With leather inlining and a wooden frame made from Rosewood, this is an all time favorite to use
